Item.method_code:
' onBefore Add/Update of Relationship ItemType 'Property LC State Check' Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim LCtransitionId As String = Me.getProperty("life_cycle_transition_id","") Dim LCtransition As Item = Me.newItem("Life Cycle Transition","get")
If LCtransitionId <> "" Then LCtransition.setID(LCtransitionId) LCtransition.setAttribute("select","source_id(name),from_state(name),to_state(name)") LCtransition = LCtransition.apply()
If LCtransition.isError() Then Return LCtransition
Dim propItem As Item = LCtransition.getPropertyItem("source_id")
Dim propVal As String = propItem.getProperty("name") Me.setProperty("life_cycle_name",propVal) propItem = LCtransition.getPropertyItem("from_state") propVal = propItem.getProperty("name") Me.setProperty("life_cycle_state_from",propVal) propItem = LCtransition.getPropertyItem("to_state") propVal = propItem.getProperty("name") Me.setProperty("life_cycle_state_to",propVal)
End If
Return Me
Item.name: PropsLC StateCheck AutoFill Data
